PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-03502020-05-18,  ,  TBS,  OAG,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAppointment of the Joint Auditor of the wholly-owned subsidiaries of the Public Sector Pension Investment Board
PrecisOrder Appointing (a) an AUDITOR for each of the wholly-owned subsidiaries of the PUBLIC SECTOR PENSION INVESTMENT BOARD for their respective fiscal years ending between January 1, 2018 and March 31, 2019; and (b) the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of the wholly-owned subsidiaries for their respective fiscal years ending between January 1, 2018 and March 31, 2019.
AttachmentsAttachment
